title: Warcraft Orcs And Humans (Tiny Size)
description:
Another game for all you old game lovers

warcraft orcs and humans, the first in the warcraft and my faviorite and im sure all you love it as well.

Well unless you have a dos pc, you have to use dosbox to play but this one is a bit more difficult to get going so heres a little guidance for you:

1)Open dosbox 
2)Do all the steps to load up any other game(if you dont know how this is done look at my fifa 97 torrent) but stop when you get to the point of putting the .exe files name
3)Instead of putting WAR.EXE(the exe file to load the game) put SETUP.EXE and hit enter
4)The setup wizard will show up and ask for a code, the code is "install"
5)Configure your sound and video setting and click save and exit
6)A message in Dosbox will say "Setup complete! Type "WAR" to start
7)Type WAR.EXE and enjoy the game

You wont have to this again after you have done it the once

Hope this works for you if not just comment

Enjoy
